name: Good Luck Santa
description:
Merry Christmas 2017 from your good friend Mike T!

Can you deliver presents to the world's children and bats in just one night? Probably not.

If you like the tune, you can get it here.

The game is free. I just made it for fun, to amuse my kids, and to spread a little cheer. Any money you choose to pay for it I'll pass on to http://projectlinus.org.

Have a merry Christmas, or a happy holiday, or just a damn fine winter.
